key.name: dwell-time
key.description: Time in seconds before a click is triggered.

key.name: dwell-threshold
key.description: Distance in pixels before movement will be recognized.

key.name: dwell-gesture-single
key.description: Direction to perform a single click. ("0" = Left, "1" = Right, "2" = Up, "3" = Down)

key.name: dwell-gesture-double
key.description: Direction to perform a double click. ("0" = Left, "1" = Right, "2" = Up, "3" = Down)

key.name: dwell-gesture-drag
key.description: Direction to perform dragging. ("0" = Left, "1" = Right, "2" = Up, "3" = Down)

key.name: dwell-gesture-secondary
key.description: Direction to perform a secondary click. ("0" = Left, "1" = Right, "2" = Up, "3" = Down)

key.name: dwell-mode
key.description: The active dwell click mode. ("0" = Window mode, "1" = Gesture mode)

key.name: ctw-style
key.description: Button style in the click type window. ("0" = Text, "1" = Icon, "2" = Both)

key.name: ssc-time
key.description: Time in seconds before a simulated secondary click is triggered.

key.name: animate-cursor
key.description: Show elapsed time as a cursor overlay.
